#summary Describes the translation work flow.

= Introduction =

!TongueTied provides a work flow around keyword translations so that you can ensure the validity of each translation.


= Details =

Translations can have a state. "Unverified", "Verified" or "Queried". A new translation will have a state of "Unverified". Later, you can have person of role "Verifier" check the validity of the translation and assign a new state of "Verified" if the value is correct, or mark it as "Queried" if the verifier feels the translation is not correct.
